scripts.deploy:testnet: npm run build:contract && cd testnet_settings && node testnet_full_setup.js && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run build:contract && npm run deploy:contract
scripts.prestart: npm run build:contract:debug && npm run dev:deploy:contract
scripts.test:rust: npm run build:contract && cargo test -- --nocapture && cd nft_staking && cargo test -- --nocapture && cd ..
scripts.test:lib: npm run build:contract && clear && NEAR_ENV=sandbox jest && cd tests-rs && cargo test && cd ..
